title: Implement intelligent test data generation system
description: Build AI-powered test data generator that creates realistic test datasets, maintains data privacy, and automatically generates edge cases for comprehensive testing coverage
asA: test automation engineer creating test scenarios
iWant: intelligent test data generation with privacy protection and edge case coverage
soThat: I can generate comprehensive test datasets within 10 minutes and achieve 95% test scenario coverage
acceptanceCriteria: Test data generation completes within 10 minutes for datasets up to 100k records
Privacy protection ensures no real user data is exposed in test environments
Edge case generation covers 95% of potential failure scenarios automatically
Generated data maintains referential integrity and business rule compliance
